section.title: Overview
section.para: The module is an implementation of the internal DB API v1 connector for SQlite 3 file.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
No dependencies on other &kamailio; modules.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
SQlite 3 library - e.g., libsqlite3-0
SQlite 3 devel library - to compile the module e.g. libsqlite3-dev
SQlite 3 utilities - for kamdbctl e.g. sqlite3
